Title: Relates to party nominations by multiple political parties
Summary: Relates to party nominations by multiple political parties; provides that a candidate for election to public office nominated by a political party may also receive a nomination of any other political party and a candidate nominated by more than one political party shall be deemed to have received all votes cast in such candidate's name; provides that any provision of the Campaign Finance Reform Commission's final report deemed inconsistent with this act by a court shall also be deemed repealed by this act.
LawCode: Amd ยง1-104, add ยง6-103, El L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to party nominations by multiple political parties
